headline.main: Pope Urges Faithful to Consult Bible as Often as Cellphones
headline.print_headline: Pope Urges Faithful to Consult Bible as Often as Cellphones

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis has called on the faithful to consult the Bible with the same frequency as they might consult their cellphones for messages.
snippet: Pope Francis has called on the faithful to consult the Bible with the same frequency as they might consult their cellphones for messages....
